==== Lossless ====

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| Name
| Short Description
| Supported
|-
| <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Apple_Lossless|ALAC]]</nowiki>
| Apples Lossless audio format as created by iTunes
| supported (universe/multiverse)
|-
| <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FLAC|FLAC]]</nowiki>
| Free Lossless Audio Codec, patent free
| supported (main)
|-
| <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WavPack|WavPack]]</nowiki>
| has a lossless, lossy and hybrid mode
| supported (universe/multiverse (breezy), main/universe (dapper))
|-
| <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/TTA|TTA]]</nowiki>
| 
| not supported (free implementations exist)
|-
| <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monkey%27s_Audio|Monkey's Audio (APE)]]</nowiki>
| good compressions rates
| not supported (free implementations exist)
|-
| <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shorten|Shorten]]</nowiki>
| popular in the traders scene
| not supported (free implementations exist)
|-
| <nowiki>[[http://www.losslessaudio.org|OptimFROG]]</nowiki>
| 
| not supported (no known free implementations but binaries for linux exist)
|-
| <nowiki>[[http://www.realnetworks.com/products/codecs/realaudio.html|RealAudio Lossless ]]</nowiki>
| 
| not supported (maybe can be played with the realplayer for linux)
|-
| <nowiki>[[http://www.lossless-audio.com|LA (Lossless Audio)]]</nowiki>
| very good compression rates but slow
| not supported (no known free implementation)
|-
| <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Meridian_Lossless_Packing|MLP]]</nowiki>
| used on DVD-A, patented
| not supported (no known free implementation)
|-
| <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Windows_Media_Audio|Windows Media Audio 9 Lossless]]</nowiki>
| 
| not supported (no known free implementations)
